question: As of 2020, the largest cricket stadium of the world is located in which country?
explanation:
Sardar Patel Stadium located in Ahmedabad (Gujarat) also called as the Motera Stadium is the largest cricket stadium of the world and the second largest stadium in the World, after the Rungrado May Day Stadium of North Korea.
The reconstruction work of the Sardar Patel Stadium started in the year 2016. US President Donald Trump jointly addressed the ‘Namaste Trump’ event with Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the newly renovated Stadium
